snippet.title: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Pathogen Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A mysterious pathogen is wreaking havoc on planet LV-895. Join your fellow marines in an all-new campaign that takes you into the heart of the Pathogen hive. Experience new environments, maps, weapons, and more. 

Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Pathogen releases August 30th, 2022, and will be available for purchase on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4 and Steam™. A copy of Aliens: Fireteam Elite on the same platform is required to play this content.

Learn more about the Pathogen expansion: https://coldirongames.net/Pathogen 
Wishlist on Steam: https://coldirongames.net/wishlist

Subscribe to our YouTube channel and follow us to stay up to date!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AliensFireteamE
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aliensfireteamelite/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AliensFireteamElite/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/6fqMwKFK7F
